Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player is an abstract class and is designed to be used in the game Racko. It is responsible for everything a Player would have as if playing right on a table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int currentScore
      Score that the Player has in their hand
      protected Card ExtraCard
      Card that is picked up, but not in the Rack
      protected Rack Hand
      Rack that the Player has
      protected java.lang.String name
      Name of the Player
      protected int score
      Running score that the Player has accumulated
